page.publish: Your page has been published successfully.
page.setToPrivate: The page was successfully set to 'Private'.
page.unlinked: The linkage has been successfully removed.
page.addedToPersonalWiki: The page was successfully added to your wiki.
page.saveImage: The new image has been saved.
page.saved: The page has been saved successfully.
page.convertedToWiki: The page '{name}' has been successfully converted into a wiki.
page.convertedToPage: The wiki '{name}' has been successfully converted into a page.

question.published: The question '{name}' has been published successfully.
question.flashcardsAdded: One flashcard was added | {count} flashcards were added.

user.profileUpdate: Your new profile data has been saved successfully.
user.passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
user.passwordVerificationMailSent: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.

collaboration.connected: You are viewing the live version of this page.

subscription.cantAddKnowledge: You cannot add any more desired knowledge in the free version. Subscribe to Plus membership to get unlimited desired knowledge.
subscription.cantSavePrivateQuestion: In the free version, you cannot add any more private questions. Subscribe to a Plus membership to create unlimited private questions.
subscription.cantSavePrivatePage: In the free version, you cannot add any more private pages. Subscribe to a Plus membership to create unlimited private pages.

page.parentIsPrivate: Publishing is not possible. The parent page is private.
page.publicChildPages: This page has public child pages.
page.notLastChild: This page cannot be deleted because it has child pages. Please remove all child pages and try again.
page.noRemainingParents: The page cannot be unlinked because it must belong to at least one public parent page.
page.parentIsRoot: Under 'Global Wiki', you can only add private pages.
page.loopLink: Pages cannot be linked to themselves as children.
page.isAlreadyLinkedAsChild: This page is already linked as a child.
page.isNotAChild: This page is no longer a child page.
page.isLinkedInNonWuwi: You have already linked this page outside your Wunschwissen. Please disable 'Show only your Wunschwissen' and add this page to your Wunschwissen.
page.childIsParent: Parent pages cannot be assigned as child pages.
page.nameIsTaken: is already taken, please choose another name!
page.nameIsForbidden: is forbidden, please choose another name!
page.rootPageMustBePublic: The root page cannot be set to private.
page.missingRights: You do not have the necessary rights.
page.tooPopular: This page appears too often in other users' Wunschwissen.
page.saveImageError: The image could not be saved.
page.circularReference: The parent page cannot be assigned as a child page.
page.newPageIdIsPageIdToBeDeleted: The selected page cannot be the one to be deleted.
page.noChildSelected: No child page has been selected.

question.missingAnswer: The answer for the question is missing.
question.save: Your question could not be saved.
question.creation: Your question could not be created.
question.isInWuwi: The question cannot be deleted, it is included {count} time(s) in other users' Wunschwissen. Please contact us if you believe this question should still be deleted.
question.rights: You do not have the necessary permissions.
question.errorOnDelete: An error occurred! Possibly some references to the question (learning sessions, appointments, Wunschwissen entries...) have been partially deleted.
question.couldNotAddFlashcards: The flashcards could not be added.

user.emailInUse: The email address is already in use.
user.falseEmailFormat: The email address format is invalid.
user.passwordIsWrong: Incorrect password. Please re-enter your password.
user.samePassword: The new password is the same as the old one. Please enter a new password.
user.passwordNotCorrectlyRepeated: The repeated password does not match your new password.
user.passwordResetTokenIsInvalid: The link is invalid. If you’re having trouble, just send us an email at team(at)memucho.de.
user.doesNotExist: The specified user could not be found. Please check if your login details are correct.
user.invalidFBToken: Hey! It looks like the Facebook token you entered isn’t valid. Please try logging in with Facebook again. If it still doesn’t work, just contact us. We’ll be happy to help you!
user.emailIsInvalid: {email} is not a valid email address.
user.passwordTooShort: The password should be at least 5 characters long.
user.loginFailed: You could not be logged in. Please check your email address and password.

error.default: Unfortunately, an unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

route.notFound: Oh no! This page does not exist.
route.noRights: This page is private. You do not have permission to view it.
route.unauthorized: You are not logged in. You might not have access to this page.

image.tooBig: The image is too big. The file size must not exceed 1MB.

learningSession.noQuestionsAvailableWithCurrentConfig: There are no questions available for these settings. Please change the knowledge level or select all questions.

api.title: Oops!
body: Reloading the website might resolve the issue.

collaboration.couldNotConnect: The connection to the live version could not be established.
collaboration.connectionLost: The connection to the live version was interrupted.

ai.noFlashcardsCreatedCauseLimitAndPageIsPr: Oops, your limit has been reached! As the page is private, no flashcards have been created.

page.toggleHideText: Disable text input for a purely navigational page without text content. Only available for pages without text.

question.newQuestionNotInFilter: Warning: The question will not be displayed after creation because the selected options do not match the filter settings. Adjust the learning filter to display the question.
question.notInFilter: The question cannot be displayed with your question filter.
question.isPrivate: The question is private. Please log in.
question.notInPage: The question is not included on the page.

feed.private: Only you can see this entry.

ai.flashcardsCreatedWillBePublicCauseLimit: Limit for private flashcards reached. New cards will be created publicly.
ai.someFlashcardsCreatedWillBePublicCauseLi: Limit for private flashcards reached. Some new cards will be created publicly.
